comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Nautical pictures of interest., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 23745319@N05
comment._content: They appear to be 'paying' the decks; filling the gaps with pitch and cord to waterproof the spaces between the deck planks.

comment.author: 58412186@N07
comment._content: These photographs are fantastic - we have a film with footage of Alan Villiers 'Sea and Ships - The Sea, Their Future' see our catalogue reference. Unfortunately we do not have the soundtrack to go with it so you can't hear what Alan Villiers is saying. When we get it digitised we'll send you a link. Didn't know he was a photographer as well - we will add that information to the administrative history. Thanks!

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/wessexfilm] Hi Wessex Film and Sound Archive, Thanks for your comment. If you were intested in finding out more about Villiers' photography we have a page about him here .

comment.author: 58412186@N07
comment._content: Thank you for that link, it's great to be able to add contextual information like that in for the films!  I'll add this link into the admin history for the film.
